title: Join the navy and see the world they say
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Korean War, 1950-1953
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Royal Australian Navy
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
abstract: "One cold night in 1942, there was a knock on the front door..."
description: Inspired by his childhood hero, 'Uncle Jack', Ron Baguley enlisted in the Navy at the ripe age of 16. "Join the Navy and see the world they say!" In 1952, Ron was plucked from his job as a carpenter and thrown into a life at sea, serving initially in the Korean Conflict. Ron tracks his incredibly journey from a young recruit to a senior warrant officer.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002722; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [Warnambool veterans]; Active; 2011
